meanings.definition: A period of one thousand years.
meanings.sent1: The ancient civilization lasted for many millenaries.
meanings.sent2: The historians studied the millenaries of human history.
meanings.sent3: It would take millenaries to count all the grains of sand on the beach.
meanings.sent4: The millenaries of tradition were passed down through generations.
meanings.sent5: The stars in the sky seemed to have witnessed millenaries of events.

meanings.definition: A group or collection of one thousand things.
meanings.sent1: The library had millenaries of books on its shelves.
meanings.sent2: She collected millenaries of seashells from different beaches.
meanings.sent3: The millenaries of colorful balloons filled the entire room.
meanings.sent4: The millenaries of flowers in the garden created a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: The millenaries of leaves rustled in the gentle breeze.
